Articles.Content: So, here it is: An instrument the science outcomes of which depend on its orientation instead of biomes. Essentially, a space telescope. (This is also the perfect opportunity to sneak in some aliens.)

I agree, not about the aliens though. What could be cool instead is easter eggs. There can be so many things hidden in the skybox. A telescope part should also have real science as an outcome. Take a picture, get cool stuff and scientific data about the distance, size, spectrum, metallicity and all that fancy astrophysical jazz.

Edited October 21, 2016 by Veeltch
I agree. Here's an idea regarding "real science": maybe there should be a menu option to toggle between joke science that is there right now and real science?
